lg_002::milestone_card_3::text: Tell Stories with a Central Question
lg_002::markdown_card_0::text:
## Creating a detailed, complete story often requires more than three clips. In addition to using multiple character, action and result clips, many stories include two more elements:

• Place

If your character will be in many places, use place clips to show the change.

• Signature

You may want to show a specific, signature element of your character or story. Signature clips are meant to emphasize a key point of your story.
lg_002::text_card_1::text: Good. Now let's add clips to support the Character's story. With the next two clip cards, add an action and result.
